I don't know if they are the best ham sandwiches in the world but they were certainly the best ham sandwiches I had in Spain - I tried 3 other places.  I liked this place so much I ate here twice.  It's just easy, fast, affordable and delicious.  My brother came back 3 times!  We always ordered the same thing - the mini flauta d'Iberic.  The warm fresh bread is crunchy outside and soft on the inside.  The ham is thinly sliced and perfectly salty.  At other places, the ham is too rubbery or overly salty,  or the bread is very hard.  Viena does it just right.The place is casual and filled with tourists from all over the world.
